name: Google+ New Nav Mod (Res. other than 1080p) Chrome
description: Modification for Google+ New Navigation. Provides a larger space for your stream. Note: Search bar removed from Google+
additional_info:
This is only a test version of this script.

Modification for Google+ New Navigation. Provides a larger space for your stream. Note: Search bar removed from Google+ and display issue may be found on circles page and photos page.
Supports ALL screen resolutions!
